title: Video: PINS – Get With Me
body:
Manchester post-punk darlings **PINS** are set to release their debut album, _**Girls Like Us**_, through Bella Union on 30 September, and recent single Get With me captures the energy that has made them one of the must see acts on the current festival circuit.

This self-produced video shot on Super 8 at Brighton beach, perfectly mirrors the DIY aesthetic of their sound, snarlingly cutting yet strangely danceable. All it’s missing is a trampoline… Check out Get With Me below, and pre-order _**Girls Like Us**_ [here](http://bellaunion.sandbag.uk.com/Store/DII-11017-10-pins++girls+like+us+preorder.html). Also, check out a bunch of tour dates after the jump.

5 October – Sheffield, Harley  
7 October – Bristol, Louisiana  
8 October – Brighton, The Hope  
9 October – London, Birthdays  
10 October – Norwich, Hog in Armour  
11 October – Newcastle, Cluny  
12 October – Glasgow, Broadcast  
15 October – Liverpool, Leaf  
16 October – Birmingham, Bull’s Head  
17 October – Leeds, Belgrave Music Hall  
24 October – Lille (France), La Peniche  
25 October – Paris (France), Point Ephemere  
26 October – Lyon (France), Le Sonic

[PINS – GET WITH ME](http://vimeo.com/70767382) from [PINS](http://vimeo.com/wearepins) on [Vimeo](https://vimeo.com).
